mappingDbJiraFld.name: CfldExtDbGridResTp1
mappingDbJiraFld.dBQuery: select MAIN.ID as ID, MAIN.Structural_code as CD_STR, A1.Name as NAME1, A2.Name as NAME2, A3.Name as NAME3, MAIN.Сomment as COMM, STS.Name as STS FROM jira_tab_resources_issue MAIN INNER JOIN jira_tab_statusaccess STS ON MAIN.ID_Status = STS.ID LEFT JOIN jira_tab_resources A1 ON substring(MAIN.Structural_code, 1, 10) = substring(A1.Structural_code, 1, 10) AND len(A1.Structural_code) = 10 AND A1.ResourceType = <ResourceType> LEFT JOIN jira_tab_resources A2 ON substring(MAIN.Structural_code, 1, 21) = substring(A2.Structural_code, 1, 21) AND len(A2.Structural_code) = 21 AND A2.ResourceType = <ResourceType> LEFT JOIN jira_tab_resources A3 ON substring(MAIN.Structural_code, 1, 32) = substring(A3.Structural_code, 1, 32) AND len(A3.Structural_code) = 32 AND A3.ResourceType = <ResourceType> WHERE NOT (A1.NAME IS NULL AND A2.NAME IS NULL AND A3.NAME IS NULL)

dBQueryWhereConditions.where: AND MAIN.ID_Issue = <issueTask> AND MAIN.ID_Subtask IS NULL

dBQueryWhereConditions.where: AND MAIN.ID_Issue = <issueTask> AND MAIN.ID_Subtask IS NULL
